Get Proton for Business
Sign in

Comprehensive IT security ebook for small businesses

Use this guide to implement quick wins and develop a long-term strategy to keep your business safe from modern IT threats.

This ebook was written by our team of security experts who protect millions of people from cyber attacks every day.

Fields marked with * are required

You agree that this data will be processed by Proton AG pursuing its legitimate interest to develop knowledge of its corporate user base. To this end, Proton AG may resort to third-party providers.

The Proton guide to IT security for small businesses includes

Quick IT guides

Need a quick refresher or just getting started? We have quick guides to start you off with the topics that matter.

IT checklists

Review your current individual, team, and company-wide processes and establish new ones that check all the boxes.

Vendor recommendations

Evaluating your solutions? We recommend software and tools that have stood up to our team's rigorous scrutiny.

Whether you are an IT security expert or new to the field, this resource gives you the guidance and the tools you need to protect your business.

Get Proton for Business

Simple, secure solutions to protect your business

In addition to protecting millions of individuals, Proton secures more than 50,000 businesses, including some of the worlds largest public and private organizations.
